## Installation

1) Install the official version from CRAN:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("arealDB")
```

or the latest development version from github:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("EhrmannS/arealDB")
```

2) Read the [paper](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S1364815220307751) for an in-depth description of the procedure.
